text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fall they kiss my skin
Feel the rhythm let it spin
Splashing puddles joy within
Dancing in the rain again

[Verse 2]
Sky is gray but I don't mind
Find the beat and lose the time
Every step a song I find
Laughing as the stars align

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance in the rain
Feel the drops release the pain
Sing sing sing out the strain
Joy in every falling grain

[Verse 3]
Thunder roars but I don't fear
Lightning strikes the path is clear
Nature's music in my ear
Only happiness is near

[Verse 4]
Barefoot on the soggy ground
Twirl and spin no one around
Lost in the electric sound
Magic in the rain we've found

[Bridge]
Hearts are light and spirits high
Underneath the stormy sky
Close your eyes let worries fly
Dance the night don't question why
title: Dancing in the Rain
